class.name: TabBar
class.description: Simple tabs control, similar to [TabContainer] but is only in charge of drawing tabs, not interacting with children.

method.name: add_tab
method.description: Adds a new tab.

method.name: clear_tab_opentype_features
method.description: Removes all OpenType features from the tab title.

method.name: ensure_tab_visible
method.description: Moves the scroll view to make the tab visible.

method.name: get_offset_buttons_visible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the offset buttons (the ones that appear when there's not enough space for all tabs) are visible.

method.name: get_previous_tab
method.description: Returns the previously active tab index.

method.name: get_select_with_rmb
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if select with right mouse button is enabled.

method.name: get_tab_icon
method.description: Returns the [Texture2D] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] or [code]null[/code] if the tab has no [Texture2D].

method.name: get_tab_language
method.description: Returns tab title language code.

method.name: get_tab_offset
method.description: Returns the number of hidden tabs offsetted to the left.

method.name: get_tab_opentype_feature
method.description: Returns OpenType feature [code]tag[/code] of the tab title.

method.name: get_tab_rect
method.description: Returns tab [Rect2] with local position and size.

method.name: get_tab_text_direction
method.description: Returns tab title text base writing direction.

method.name: get_tab_title
method.description: Returns the title of the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: get_tabs_rearrange_group
method.description: Returns the [TabBar]'s rearrange group ID.

method.name: is_tab_disabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] is disabled.

method.name: move_tab
method.description: Moves a tab from [code]from[/code] to [code]to[/code].

method.name: remove_tab
method.description: Removes the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_select_with_rmb
method.description: If [code]true[/code], enables selecting a tab with the right mouse button.

method.name: set_tab_disabled
method.description: If [code]disabled[/code] is [code]true[/code], disables the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code], making it non-interactable.

method.name: set_tab_icon
method.description: Sets an [code]icon[/code] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_tab_language
method.description: Sets language code of tab title used for line-breaking and text shaping algorithms, if left empty current locale is used instead.

method.name: set_tab_opentype_feature
method.description: Sets OpenType feature [code]tag[/code] for the tab title. More info: [url=https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/featuretags]OpenType feature tags[/url].

method.name: set_tab_text_direction
method.description: Sets tab title base writing direction.

method.name: set_tab_title
method.description: Sets a [code]title[/code] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_tabs_rearrange_group
method.description: Defines the rearrange group ID. Choose for each [TabBar] the same value to dragging tabs between [TabBar]. Enable drag with [member drag_to_rearrange_enabled].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], tabs overflowing this node's width will be hidden, displaying two navigation buttons instead. Otherwise, this node's minimum size is updated so that all tabs are visible.
If [code]true[/code], tabs can be rearranged with mouse drag.
if [code]true[/code], the mouse's scroll wheel can be used to navigate the scroll view.
Sets when the close button will appear on the tabs. See [enum CloseButtonDisplayPolicy] for details.
The number of tabs currently in the bar.

signal.name: active_tab_rearranged
signal.description: Emitted when the active tab is rearranged via mouse drag. See [member drag_to_rearrange_enabled].

signal.name: tab_changed
signal.description: Emitted when switching to another tab.

signal.name: tab_clicked
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is clicked, even if it is the current tab.

signal.name: tab_close_pressed
signal.description: Emitted when a tab's close button is pressed. [b]Note:[/b] Tabs are not removed automatically once the close button is pressed, this behaviour needs to be programmed manually. For example: [codeblocks] [gdscript] $TabBar.tab_close_pressed.connect($TabBar.remove_tab) [/gdscript] [csharp] GetNode<TabBar>("TabBar").TabClosePressed += GetNode<TabBar>("TabBar").RemoveTab; [/csharp] [/codeblocks]

signal.name: tab_hovered
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is hovered by the mouse.

signal.name: tab_rmb_clicked
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is right-clicked.

constants.constant: Only show the close button on the currently active tab.
Show the close button on all tabs.
